thread.title: Marie McGregor Hannon
thread.title_full: McElhinneys Department Store reviewed by Marie McGregor Hannon

author: Marie McGregor Hannon
title: Marie McGregor Hannon
text: Ordered a coat on Thursday last. Received an email Friday morning confirming delivery between 9.10 and 10.10. True to form my package arrived at 10am. Excellent communication and delivery. Thank you
